attributes.action: Include 0h workers in statutory sick pay during Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: To maintain their cost of living, the government should issue statutory sick pay based on their average earnings.
attributes.background: People on 0h contracts are at risk of financial loss in the wake of the COVID-19 outbreak. As more shifts are being cancelled, people are concerned about losing their only source of financial means.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301328
